item.description:
@free_wayne wrote:

If I had to guess, I would say right where it says:

                                                int heal = (int)(damage / 4);

It looks to me like itâ€™s taking the damage you hit, and dividing it by four, and healing you by that. Try changing the 4 to something else.

item.title: PI,317,Spells
item.dc:creator: @Ineverbow Ineverbow
item.description:
@Ineverbow wrote:

when i want to edit my blood barrage heal ,where can i do it?

case 12901: case 12919: // blood spells case 12911: case 12929: int heal = (int)(damage / 4); if(c.playerLevel[3] + heal > c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3])) { c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]); } else { c.playerLevel[3] += heal; } c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); break;
this?
